alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 26 at 6:12PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A snow shower will affect Northwestern Cedar...Southwestern Jones and Northeastern Linn counties through 645 PM CST... At 611 PM CST, a snow shower was located over Viola, or near Anamosa, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Visibility under 1 mile and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar and observational data. IMPACTS...Snow covered surfaces including roadways, bridges, overpasses, and sidewalks. Difficulty seeing while driving. Strong winds will make driving difficult. Locations impacted include... Anamosa, Mechanicsville, Marion, Lisbon, Springville, Olin, Martelle, Morley, Whittier, Waubeek, Stone City, Viola, Matsell Bridge Natural Area, Howard H Cherry Scout Reservation, Wapsipinicon State Park, Hale, Marion Airport, and Paralta. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
